title: Don't wait! This spacious 2 bed, 1 bath will go fast! 925 Sq Ft!
posting_body: ['Welcome to The Bluffs at Castle Rock Apartments!', '483 Scott Blvd Castle Rock, CO 80104', 'Rental Size:', '2 BR - 1 BA - 925 sq ft |', 'Per Month:', '$2170 |', 'Lease Length:', '3-Month, 4-Month, 5-Month, 6-Month, 12-Month, 13-Month, 14-Month', 'show contact info', 'The Bluffs is conveniently located between Colorado Springs and Denver, CO, and is easily accessible from I-25.', 'You will also be just 5 minutes away from Target, Home Depot, and The Castle Rock Factory Outlets!', "We can't wait to welcome you home to The Bluffs at Castle Rock Apartments.", 'Give us a call to schedule a tour or take the next step and apply online!', 'Our community features:', '➢ BBQ and Picnic Area', '➢ Coffee Bar', '➢ Fitness Center', '➢ Laundry Facilities', '➢ Lounge', '➢ Short-term Lease Available', '➢ State-Of-The-Art Fitness Center', '➢ Walk to Rock Park & Hiking Trails', 'Our unit features:', '➢ Air Conditioning/Heating', '➢ Cable Ready', '➢ Carpet', '➢ Ceiling 'Contact us for more information!', '--', 'show contact info', '--', 'Our Pet-Policy:', 'The Bluffs at Castle Rock Apartments is a pet friendly community.', 'We allow two (2) pets max per household.',
